title: Children Hurt by Rising Food Prices (with Andrew RT Davies)
itunes:title: Children Hurt by Rising Food Prices (with Andrew RT Davies)
description:
Andrew RT Davies, leader of the Welsh Conservatives, says his party is unhappy with a possible extension of the Covid pass to hospitality in Wales.

Plus: Emma Revie, CEO of the Trussell Trust, says no-one in Britain should be destitute, as the charity prepares to hand out thousands of food parcels for children this Christmas. She tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts the furlough scheme shows just how much the government can do to help people in times of need.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

She tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts the furlough scheme shows just how much the government can do to help people in times of need.
